short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily set a playback speed for any YouTube video you watch, and the settings will be saved for future viewings as well.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever started watching a YouTube video, only to realize it's longer than you expected and you don't have enough time to finish it? With our handy extension, you can set a global YouTube speed for every video. Just set it to 1.25 and you'll start seeing the time savings add up. No more getting stuck watching a lengthy video when you're short on time!

Easely set your youtube speed faster or slower for the current tab and the future ones

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/Stefben46/Yotube-Speed-Changer
